subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Pavel Datsyuk returned to Detroit’s lineup with two assists, inspiring a thrashing of the Penguins that gave the Red Wings a 3-2 series lead in the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: Pavel Datsyuk returned to Detroit’s lineup with two assists, inspiring a thrashing of the Penguins that gave the Red Wings a 3-2 series lead in the Stanley Cup finals.
